name: Loyaltyworks Incentive Programs

overview:
Loyaltyworks designs and runs online, points-based reward and incentive programs that help companies improve sales, engage employees, build loyal relationships and motivate behaviors that drive measurable business results.

Loyaltyworks consults with clients, considering their business objectives, brand and work culture to create reward programs that seamlessly integrate into their overall strategy and drive the correct business factors for success.

Loyaltyworks reward programs run on the RewardTrax incentive technology platform, which provides a secure, client-branded program Website for participant use and a Web-based administrative back end for program management and reporting. Program participants are awarded points (as rewards for desired behaviors) which can be redeemed at the program Web site for a wide variety of travel, merchandise and event ticket rewards. Millions of reward choices are available, and are presented to participants with real-time price and availability information. Loyaltyworks and clients can use RewardTrax back-end to manage participants, points and run reports to track program activity, budgets, participant data, etc.

Loyaltyworks incentive programs are turnkey and supported with program design services, account management, reward fulfillment, program communications, and more.
